txt.en: The Corsair hunters are at Makham Hosh, on the west side of Tol Fennas.\n\nGlíreth asked you to find a Corsair hunting camp on Tol Fennas and defeat those within. A boat in the harbour of Dol Amroth can take you to Tol Fennas.

'The Corsairs have been very active recently and started encroaching on these lands more and more. The large island to the west, Tol Fennas, they are using as a base of operations.

'Makham Hosh, a camp on the west side of the island, is being run as a hunting camp. They are catching and killing anything on the island they can find to use as food. We rely on that island as a source of meat during the longer winters.

'Use a small boat from the harbour to take yourself out to the island. When you get there, find the camp and defeat any Corsairs you find within.'
Glíreth is in Dol Amroth.\n\nGlíreth will be pleased to hear the Corsair hunters have been thinned.
Corsairs have set up a small camp on the west side of the island. Clearing out the camp will help to stem the tide.
'More will come, I have no doubt of that, but you have at least saved some of the wild-life for a time.'
